parameter.name: FriendContext-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: FriendContext 應用程式在 web.config 中用來存取資料庫的連接字串。
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source=(localdb)\MSSQLLocalDB; Initial Catalog=FriendContext-20210728135439; Integrated Security=True; MultipleActiveResultSets=True; AttachDbFilename=|DataDirectory|FriendContext-20210728135439.mdf
